isis.stitle: 10 SPEED TRANSMISSIONS FULLER RT-610 SERIES - REASSEMBLE - GEAR SHIFT LEVER HOUSING

step1.para: Install the pivot pin in the bore in the housing, thread end outward.
Install the lockwasher and nut on the pivot pin ( Figure 119).

figure.caption: Figure 119. Install Lockwasher and Nut on Pivot Pin

step1.para: Mount the housing in a soft-jawed vise with the large, bottom opening upwards.
Inset the gear shift lever in the housing, fitting slot in the pivot ball of the shift lever on the pivot pin ( Figure 120).

figure.caption: Figure 120. Insert Gear Shift Lever in Housing

step1.para: Install the tension spring washer in the housing ( Figure 121).

figure.caption: Figure 121. Install Tension Spring Washer in Housing

step1.para: Install the tension spring in the housing, seating the spring under the lugs cast inside the housing ( Figure 122).

figure.caption: Figure 122. Install Tension Spring in Housing

step1.para: Remove from vise and install the rubber dust protector over the gear shift lever and against the neck of the housing. (Do not install the ball grip on the lever until after the range control valve has been installed.)
